message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a great value and I think you'll get a lot of use out of it.
Alice, thanks for the offer! While I see the value in this product, I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'd be willing to purchase it for $10000.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, and I appreciate your honesty. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $11000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the value you're getting. Let me know what you think.
